workflow.heading: Frontend
workflow.description: In my day-to-day role I work with HTML, CSS, Javascript (ES6) and Vue.js (Vue 3/Nuxt).

workflow.heading: CMS
workflow.description: I'm a Umbraco Certified Professional and have worked on numerous end-to-end Umbraco builds.

workflow.heading: Methodology
workflow.description: Approaching development in a modular way by breaking down designs into re-usable components and composing them into layouts using pattern libraries.
